comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: This joyful Eastertide, away with sin and sorrow! My Love, the Crucified, has sprung to life this morrow:

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Deathâ€™s flood has lost its chill since Jesus crossed the river; Lover of souls, from ill my passing soul deliver: [Refrain]

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My flesh in hope shall rest and for a season slumber till trump from east to west shall wake the dead in number: [Refrain]
